original_title: La véridique légende du sous-commandant Marcos
overview: Documentary that tells the deepest story of Mexico today. The story of the Zapatista Army of National Liberation, that army of Mayan Indians that burst into our lives with the sound of the voices of women and men who emerged, on January 1, 1994, from the Lacandon jungle to tell the powerful enough is enough!
title: La véridique légende du sous-commandant Marcos
